FamilyGroupContent.Title: What membership activity do you need to complete?

FamilySubGroupContentLink.Title: Renew your Reddah LIVE Gold Membership
FamilySubGroupContentLink.Description: Learn how to renew your Reddah LIVE membership either from your computer or on your console.

FamilySubGroupContentLink.Title: Cancel Your Reddah LIVE Gold Membership
FamilySubGroupContentLink.Description: Find out how to cancel your membership or turn off auto-renewal.

FamilySubGroupContentLink.Title: Add or Edit an Reddah LIVE Payment Option
FamilySubGroupContentLink.Description: Learn how to add or change a payment option (such as a credit card) associated with your Reddah LIVE account.

FamilySubGroupContentLink.Title: Change Payment for an Reddah LIVE Membership
FamilySubGroupContentLink.Description: Learn how to change the payment option associated with your paid Reddah LIVE membership. This procedure can help you reinstate a suspended account.

FamilySubGroupContentLink.Title: Remove an Reddah LIVE Payment Option
FamilySubGroupContentLink.Description: Learn how to remove a payment option (such as a credit card) from your Reddah LIVE account.

FamilySubGroupContentLink.Title: Manage Your Microsoft account
FamilySubGroupContentLink.Description: Learn how to view, change, and manage password options for your Microsoft account and Reddah LIVE membership.
